General.Name: Unilumin Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Unilumin Group Co., Ltd together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and services LED display and lighting solutions in China and internationally. It offers LED displays for security big emergency, smart city, judicial, transportation, energy, people's livelihood, high-end commercial, wisdom meeting, physical education, and business. The company also provides LED landscape lighting, such as building, city, cultural tourism, and venue lighting, and tall buildings. In addition, it offers LED professional lighting, including outdoor and indoor lighting, and smart pole. Further, the company provides outdoor street and tunnel lights. Unilumin Group Co., Ltd was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
